title: Thank you !
body:
Hi everybody !

The Interforums Tournament has ended with the Final beetween France and Germany (France 1-2 Germany).
I hope you liked it, and if yes, maybe we'll make a new edition in the future :)

-----
#Results

**_Group Stage :_**

1. Germany 4w / 0l
2. France 3w / 1 l
3. Italy 2w / 2l
4. England 1w / 3l
5. Spain 0w / 4l

**_Playoffs :_**
_Semifinal_
France 2-1 Italy
Germany 2-0 England

_Final_
Germany 2-1 France

Here are the results : http://canisback.com/tournament/

----
#Where can I watch the games ?

You can watch all the games [**HERE**](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSEKlXzJVzJpJ9np1okqI_g)

-----
#SPECIAL THANKS

To all the players who participated, all the streamers Malt, Raultevek and BophTeiphong, Riot Games, the volunteers Emmisianno, Soul92fly, Mrs Kalea and Zerhel, Elthision, MeDroiD, Paigeounette, HMS, Canis, Imaxaroth and the others i forgot.

And of course thanks to YOU for following and supporting this community event ! :)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
